#summary This page instructs users on how to create a visual network.

<wiki:toc max_depth="1" />

= Introduction =

Visual representation helps immensely in portraying data. Netflux may be used in conjunction with Cytoscape to create a picture of your network. 

= Requirements = 
  * Cytoscape, which can be found at http://cytoscape.org/
